env.GYP_DEFINES: asan=1 clang=1 coverage=1 dcheck_always_on=0 fastbuild=1 gomadir='[CACHE]/cipd/goma' lsan=1 sanitizer_coverage=bb target_arch=x64 test_isolation_mode=prepare use_goma=1 v8_target_arch=x64

cmd:
import sys, os
path = sys.argv[1]
mode = int(sys.argv[2])
if not os.path.isdir(path):
  if os.path.exists(path):
    print "%s exists but is not a dir" % path
    sys.exit(1)
  os.makedirs(path, mode)
name: makedirs for peeking gn
~followup_annotations: @@@STEP_LOG_LINE@python.inline@    print "%s exists but is not a dir" % path@@@
